comments:
The following error occurs when pressing CTRL-SPACE for content assist.
The assist window does not show up. When this error happened once in an Eclipse session, it happens all the time.
The error occurs once out ov every 3-5 Eclipse startups.
It seems that when Eclipse started successfully and content assist *is* working, it is working all the time in the session.

I am working in the following environment:

Rational Software Architect V7.0.0.2
IBM JDK 1.5.0 (J9)
Eclipse JDT 3.2.2.r322_v20070104
Mylar 2.0.0.v20070514-1800

Anyone else experiencing this behaviour?

Thanks!

Best regards
Andreas Deimer

Ok, I am running the last release for Eclipse 3.2 for one week now, and the problem never occured.

Thanks for looking into this.

Andreas
